snippet.title: Okami HD comes to PS4, Xbox and PC on 12/12
snippet.description:
Okami HD journeys onto PlayStation 4, Xbox One and PC on December 12, 2017. More details: http://bit.ly/OkamiHDblog

'Like' on Facebook
http://www.facebook.com/Okami

Follow on Twitter
